name: Kirby Spinner Demo 1.O
description:
nothing weird here..

Ok fine you caught me! But if you want to catch me again, play this game.

Kirby Spinner 1.0 Demo is a spinner game of Kirby inside made with Scratch

To download project from scratch:

Make a account, make a project (such as demos), then your done with the project! Just then click files, then save from  computer, now download, and it’s done.
